Presented in opposition to [Analytic philosophy](/docs/phil/Analytic philosophy.html). [^ro]

Downstream of [Husserl](/docs/phil/people/Edmund Husserl.html).

[^ro]: However, Rorty assimilates both as different forms of [neokantianism](/docs/phil/Neokantianism.html).
